players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think Charlie is the mafia."
You: "I think Bob is the mafia because he was the only one to speak."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob. He is mafia. Bob knows I'm detective. Vote him."
Charlie: "I know Bob is mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he's deflecting. Alice, trust my investigation. Vote Bob to stop the killer."
You: remained silent.
Bob: "Charlie is lying, he knows I'm mafia, yet he says I'm mafia. That means he's lying. Alice, vote for Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

Alice: "I think Bob is the mafia because he was the only one to speak."

Charlie: "I know Bob is mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he's deflecting. Alice, trust my investigation. Vote Bob to stop the killer."
Alice: remained silent.
You: "Charlie is lying, he knows I'm mafia, yet he says I'm mafia. That means he's lying. Alice, vote for Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

You: "I know Bob is mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he's deflecting. Alice, trust my investigation. Vote Bob to stop the killer."
Alice: remained silent.
Bob: "Charlie is lying, he knows I'm mafia, yet he says I'm mafia. That means he's lying. Alice, vote for Charlie."
